{
  int comp,amont;
  double flux;

  if (psc >= 0)
    {
      amont = num1;
      fluent[num2] += psc;
    }
  else
    {
      amont = num2;
      fluent[num1] -= psc;
    }

  for (comp=0; comp<ncomp; comp++)
    {
      flux = transporte(amont,comp)*psc;
      resu(num1,comp) -= flux;
      resu(num2,comp) += flux;
    }
}
